description: This view filters out premium billing payment data that is not appropriate for member level EHI exports when group billing is used.

columns.name: PB_TXSET_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing transaction set.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line counter for the exception on the transaction set.

columns.name: EXCEPT_PB_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing detailed transaction associated with the exception.

columns.name: EXCEPT_PMT
columns.description: Amount actually paid for the exception.

columns.name: EXCEPT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reason for the exception.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
